channel.title: Favorite Cigarette?
channel.description:
Well what is your favorite brand/type of cigarette? If you don't smoke then you can still vote for whatever sounds the coolest to you :P And if I don't have your brand that just post it and vote for Other. ;D
I <3 Newport 100s

item.title: Favorite Cigarette?
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

I don’t smoke much, but when i do, it’s either Camel or Marlboro red.

edit: added some brands which came to my mind =)

item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

Oh god.
Menthol is the fucking worst shit ever. Why don’t you try growing your own plant then smoke it right off the leaf. Fuck buying it.
Growing makes it taste about 100 times better. But plant in quantity so you will have a few a week or whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Cigarette?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Good article Rictoo.

The most important thing to remember is that there have been no studies that conclusively prove the danger of secondhand smoke. There’s no way to show that walking down a busy street past gas guzzling cars every day is less dangerous than beign neer somebody who is smoking. Common sense tells us secondhand smoke can’t be good for you, but the margin of error in most of the studies undertaken on the subject, it might very well be.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Cigarette?
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Freak Teh Freak
item.description:
@Teh_Freak wrote:

[quote=“arraness14, post:14, topic:17134”][quote author=Teh Freak link=topic=25657.msg292375#msg292375 date=1160121563]

dont smoke never will, i hate anyone who smokes, fags like you gave my mom lung cancer (from second hand smoke) and before you say you havent tried, i have, once, it tasted like complete shit

k, if you want to play the FEEL SORRY FOR ME GAME, my dad had cancer with less than 25% survival rate, and came over it, my brother had cancer at the age of 3, with 50 cases WORLD WIDE and survived that, my grandmother just recently came out of her cancer, my dad had kidney failure after my brother defeated his cancer, so, lets not play the feel sorry for me game, tbh ive grown up in a christian household, and if you believe in jesus or whatever, i say pray, because if you feel better, you get better, if you say, cancer you win, it will kill you, its been proven.
[/quote]

Whats the name of your family angel?[/quote]

i named him mufasa.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I live in kentucky of course I’m gonna smoke marlboro and just for the good ole nicotene I’ll cut off the filter. make’s many people gag but if you can handle it I say your on your way to being a man. menthol is for pussies.

I smoke camel too infact I won tons of prizes… like I have a clarinete case… what the fuck im gonna do with it I dont know… uh… a limited edition zippo camel lighter… uh and for marlboro I got this pack of cards and a personal ash tray

But this is just my opinion, its your ass not mine!!!
